function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Access to green areas during and after confinement","Impact":"Lack of access to green spaces can impact mental and physical well-being, leading to increased stress and reduced overall health.","Mitigation":"Implement policies to ensure access to green spaces, promote community gardens, and incorporate green roofs in urban planning.","Technologies":"Urban planning software, community engagement platforms, and survey tools for data collection.","People":"Citizens in confinement and urban residents.","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Willingness to pay for green roofs","Impact":"Low willingness to pay for green roofs may limit the integration of accessible green spaces in buildings, impacting the overall health and well-being of residents.","Mitigation":"Educate the public on the benefits of green roofs, offer subsidies for green roof installations, and incentivize building developers to integrate green spaces.","Technologies":"Educational materials, financial modeling tools, and incentive programs.","People":"Building residents, developers, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Government agencies, building developers, and community organizations."}]}
